about_the_game:
The journey begins in Blackwood Forest, a place simmering with dark secrets. After humans transformed the once-pristine forest into a recreational area, destroying its habitat, dark forces are seeking revenge. As night falls, long-forgotten souls awaken from their slumber to expel the malevolent human presence from the forest once and for all.

Are you the last glimmer of hope in a world shrouded by the dark shadows? As an Exorcist, you explore long-abandoned areas and face the horrors that the night brings. Improve your skills to avoid losing your way in the darkness – craft traps and stealthily navigate your surroundings.

Your mission: Break the curse, defeat the inhuman, and illuminate the paths of the unknown night. Dare to challenge the night to awaken the light.

Whether with friends or other brave players, you fight for survival against the unknown that the night offers. Are you strong enough to stand side by side against the grip of the demon?

Welcome to the World of the Night!


You decide which role you play.
Are you a Mechanic? Doctor? Survival Expert? Or perhaps a Nature Enthusiast? Find out and face your destiny in the battle between life and death.

The Doctor is the guardian of healing. He not only soothes his own wounds but also those of his teammates. With skilled hands and the right items, he becomes the savior in desperate moments.

The Mechanic is the master of machines. He is the key to enlightenment. Complex devices are his specialty, providing his teammates with time to escape the darkness even in the darkest hour.

The Survival Expert loves puzzles and is trained in the art of camouflage, like a shadow in the night. With his ability to remain unnoticed, he moves and sneaks skillfully between the clutches of darkness.

The Nature Enthusiast is one with his natural surroundings. He knows the secret paths and tracks the night. His knowledge of flora and fauna allows him to use nature itself as a weapon, providing shared advantages.

Develop Your Skills


Explore a wide range of abilities to customize your unique playstyle. With each point category, you unlock new skills that expand your possibilities in the fight against the unknown.

Choose your traps wisely to adapt your strategy to the demands of your environment. Your ability to use traps effectively influences your success in overcoming obstacles and combating the darkness.

Map-Specific Advantages


Use the warming light as a refuge amidst the impenetrable darkness, traverse the old vaults that lie deep underground, or find shelter under the familiar covers of beds. But the night won't always make it easy for you!

Choose your path, At Night.

content_descriptors.notes: In 'At Night,' players can find various violent environmental details scattered across the maps, contributing to the game's atmosphere. These elements are statically placed and serve as visual enhancements to the game. Players are not prompted or required to engage in violent actions.
